imagingbook.pub.sift.scalespace

Class ScaleOctave

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.sift.scalespace.ScaleOctave
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DogOctave, GaussianOctave

    public abstract class ScaleOctave
extends Object
    Represents a stack of scale levels within an octave. Basically this is only an array with flexible bottom and top index.
